title: Quinoxaline-based nonfullerene acceptors with powerful core-functionalization ability enabling efficient solar energy utilization
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01474J, Perspective
Kerui Liu, Yuanyuan Jiang, Feng Liu, Xiaozhang Zhu
Solar energy utilization is a promising renewable technology for achieving efficient energy conversion. Nonfullerene acceptors (NFAs) have triggered wide interest in solar energy exploitation due to their multiple merits such...
